name: Acrobatic Strike
description: You can use Acrobatics to tumble through an enemy’s space and gain a +2 bonus on your next melee attack against that enemy.

name: Adaptable Talent
description: Once per day, you may gain the benefit of any talent from a class you have levels in for 1 minute.

name: Advanced Melee Weapon Proficiency
description: You are proficient with advanced melee weapons and do not take the -5 penalty when using them.

name: Armor Proficiency (Light)
description: You are proficient with light armor and do not take armor check penalties on attack rolls.

name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
description: You are proficient with medium armor and do not take armor check penalties on attack rolls.

name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
description: You are proficient with heavy armor and do not take armor check penalties on attack rolls.

name: Assured Attack
description: Once per encounter, you may reroll an attack roll and take the better result.

name: Autofire Assault
description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls made with autofire attacks.

name: Bantha Rush
description: You may make a bull rush attempt as a swift action after hitting with a melee attack.

name: Battle Meditation
description: You may spend a Force Point to grant allies within line of sight a +1 bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and Will Defense for 1 minute.

name: Block
description: Once per round, when you are hit by a melee attack, you may negate the hit. Make a Use the Force check; if the result equals or exceeds the attack roll, the attack is negated.

name: Burst of Speed
description: Once per encounter, you may move an additional 2 squares as a swift action.

name: Charging Fire
description: You may make a ranged attack at the end of a charge, taking a -2 penalty on the attack roll.

name: Cleave
description: If you deal enough damage to drop a target, you may make an immediate melee attack against another target within reach.

name: Combat Reflexes
description: You may make a number of attacks of opportunity per round equal to your Dexterity modifier.

name: Conditioned
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Endurance checks and may reroll a failed Endurance check once per encounter.

name: Coordinated Attack
description: When you and an ally both attack the same target in the same round, you each gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that target.

name: Crush
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Force Grip
description: You may spend a Force Point to move a target -1 step down the condition track when using Force Grip.

name: Deadeye
description: You may reroll a ranged attack roll once per encounter and take the better result.

name: Delay Damage
description: Once per encounter, you may delay the effects of damage taken until the end of your next turn.

name: Deflect
description: Once per round, when you are hit by a ranged attack, you may negate the hit. Make a Use the Force check; if the result equals or exceeds the attack roll, the attack is negated.

name: Desperate Gambit
description: Once per day, you may take a -5 penalty on a skill check to treat the result as if you had rolled a natural 20.

name: Double Attack
description: You may make two attacks on your turn as a full-round action, each at a -5 penalty.

name: Dual Weapon Mastery I
description: You reduce the penalty for fighting with two weapons by 2.

name: Dual Weapon Mastery II
description: You reduce the penalty for fighting with two weapons by an additional 2.

name: Dual Weapon Mastery III
description: You take no penalty for fighting with two weapons.

name: Educated
description: Choose two Knowledge skills. You gain a +5 bonus on checks with those skills.

name: Elusive Target
description: When fighting defensively or using the total defense action, you may redirect missed melee attacks to another target adjacent to you.

name: Far Shot
description: You reduce the range penalties for ranged attacks by half.

name: Fast Surge
description: You may activate Surge as a swift action instead of a standard action.

name: Fast Talk
description: You may make a Persuasion check to feint in combat as a swift action instead of a standard action.

name: Force Boon
description: You gain an additional Force Point at the beginning of each level.

name: Force Focus
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate a specific Force power you select when taking this feat.

name: Force Training
prerequisite: Force Sensitivity, Trained in Use the Force
description: You learn a number of Force powers equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

name: Forceful Blast
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Force Slam
description: You may spend a Force Point to move a target -1 step down the condition track when using Force Slam.

name: Forceful Grip
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Force Grip
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Force Grip.

name: Forceful Slam
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Force Slam
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Force Slam.

name: Forceful Throw
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Move Object
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Move Object.

name: Forceful Vitality
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Endurance checks and may reroll a failed Endurance check once per encounter.

name: Frightful Presence
description: As a standard action, you may make a Persuasion check to intimidate all enemies within 6 squares. On a success, targets move -1 step down the condition track.

name: Frightening Presence
description: When you use Frightful Presence, targets that fail their Will Defense check move -2 steps down the condition track instead of -1.

name: Force Regimen Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain the benefit of a Force Regimen you’ve completed within the last 24 hours.

name: Forceful Recovery
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a failed Endurance check to recover from a condition or persistent effect.

name: Forceful Saber Throw
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Saber Throw
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Saber Throw.

name: Forceful Strike
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Force Stun
description: You may spend a Force Point to move a target -1 step down the condition track when using Force Stun.

name: Forceful Stun
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Force Stun
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Force Stun.

name: Forceful Telekinesis
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Move Object
description: You may spend a Force Point to move a target -1 step down the condition track when using Move Object.

name: Forceful Warrior
description: You gain a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls made while using a Force power.

name: Forceful Weapon
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Battle Strike
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Battle Strike.

name: Forceful Will
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Will Defense against mind-affecting effects and may reroll a failed Will Defense check once per encounter.

name: Friendly Fire Avoidance
description: You may choose to exclude a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier from the area of effect of your autofire attacks.

name: Frightening Presence
description: When you use Frightful Presence, targets that fail their Will Defense check move -2 steps down the condition track instead of -1.

name: Grappling Strike
description: When you hit with a melee attack, you may initiate a grapple as a free action without provoking an attack of opportunity.

name: Great Fortitude
description: You gain a +2 bonus to your Fortitude Defense.

name: Greater Weapon Focus
prerequisite: Weapon Focus with selected weapon group, base attack bonus +8
description: You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with the selected weapon group. This stacks with Weapon Focus.

name: Greater Weapon Specialization
prerequisite: Weapon Specialization with selected weapon group, base attack bonus +12
description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with the selected weapon group. This stacks with Weapon Specialization.

name: Hard Target
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense against ranged attacks while moving at least 2 squares on your turn.

name: Harm’s Way
description: As a reaction, you may take damage dealt to an adjacent ally instead of them.

name: Headstrong
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Will Defense against fear effects and may reroll a failed Will Defense check once per encounter.

name: Heavy Weapon Proficiency
description: You are proficient with heavy weapons and do not take the -5 penalty when using them.

name: Heroic Surge
description: Once per encounter, you may take an additional standard or move action on your turn.

name: Hew
description: When you use Power Attack, you ignore an amount of damage reduction equal to your base attack bonus.

name: Improved Defenses
description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Reflex, Fortitude, and Will Defense.

name: Improved Damage Threshold
description: Your damage threshold increases by 5.

name: Improved Disarm
description: You gain a +5 bonus on attack rolls made to disarm an opponent.

name: Improved Grapple
description: You gain a +5 bonus on grapple checks and do not provoke attacks of opportunity when initiating a grapple.

name: Improved Knock Prone
description: You gain a +5 bonus on attack rolls made to knock an opponent prone.

name: Improved Stun
description: You gain a +5 bonus on attack rolls made to stun an opponent.

name: Indomitable Will
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Will Defense against mind-affecting effects and may reroll a failed Will Defense check once per encounter.

name: Intimidating Presence
description: You may use Persuasion to intimidate as a swift action instead of a standard action.

name: Intuitive Initiative
description: You may reroll your Initiative check and take the better result. You must keep the new result even if it is worse.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: You may make untrained skill checks with any skill, even those that normally require training.

name: Keen Force Mind
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate mind-affecting Force powers.

name: Knock Prone
description: You may attempt to knock an opponent prone with a melee attack. If successful, the target falls prone.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: You gain a +2 bonus to your Reflex Defense.

name: Linguist
description: You learn three additional languages. You may take this feat multiple times.

name: Low Profile
description: You gain cover from enemies at long range and may reroll Stealth checks made to avoid detection.

name: Lucky Shot
description: Once per encounter, you may reroll a ranged attack roll and take the better result.

name: Melee Defense
description: As a swift action, you may take a -5 penalty on melee attack rolls to gain a +5 bonus to your Reflex Defense against melee attacks until the start of your next turn.

name: Mighty Swing
description: Once per encounter, you may reroll a melee attack roll and take the better result.

name: Mobile Fighting
description: You may move up to your speed when using the withdraw action, and you gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense against attacks of opportunity provoked by movement.

name: Mobility
description: You gain a +5 bonus to Reflex Defense against attacks of opportunity provoked by movement.

name: Mounted Combat
description: Once per round, when your mount is hit in combat, you may make a Ride check to negate the hit.

name: Natural Leader
description: You may grant allies within line of sight a +1 bonus on attack rolls and skill checks for 1 minute as a standard action once per encounter.

name: Noble Fencing Style
description: When wielding a weapon with Weapon Finesse, you may use your Charisma modifier instead of Strength for attack rolls.

name: Pin
description: You may attempt to pin a grappled opponent. If successful, the target is immobilized until they escape the grapple.

name: Point Blank Shot
description: You gain a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls against targets within 30 squares.

name: Power Attack
description: You may take a penalty on melee attack rolls to gain a bonus on melee damage rolls equal to the penalty.

name: Precise Shot
description: You do not take the -5 penalty for firing into melee.

name: Quick Draw
description: You may draw or holster a weapon as a swift action instead of a move action.

name: Rapid Shot
description: When making a full attack with a ranged weapon, you may make one additional attack. All attacks take a -2 penalty.

name: Reactive Stealth
description: Once per encounter, you may reroll a Stealth check and take the better result.

name: Reckless Charge
description: When you charge, you gain a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls but take a -2 penalty to Reflex Defense until the start of your next turn.

name: Redirect Shot
prerequisite: Trained in Use the Force, Deflect
description: When you successfully negate a ranged attack with Deflect, you may redirect the shot to another target within line of sight.

name: Resilient Strength
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude Defense against effects that target Strength and may reroll a failed check once per encounter.

name: Resilient Talent
description: Once per day, you may gain the benefit of any talent from a class you have levels in for 1 minute. You may use this talent even if you do not meet its prerequisites.

name: Running Attack
description: You may make a single melee or ranged attack at any point during a move action taken on your turn.

name: Saber Throw
description: You may throw your lightsaber as a ranged attack using Use the Force instead of a ranged attack roll. The lightsaber returns to your hand at the end of the turn.

name: Savage Attack
description: You may reroll a damage roll and take the better result. You must keep the new result even if it is worse.

name: Scavenger
description: You may reroll a Mechanics check made to disable or salvage a device and take the better result.

name: Rapid Strike
description: When making a full attack with a melee weapon, you may make one additional attack. All attacks take a -2 penalty.

name: Reactive Awareness
description: Once per encounter, you may reroll a Perception check and take the better result.

name: Resilient Reflexes
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Reflex Defense against effects that target Dexterity and may reroll a failed check once per encounter.

name: Resilient Will
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Will Defense against effects that target Wisdom and may reroll a failed check once per encounter.

name: Skill Focus
description: You gain a +5 bonus on all checks with the selected skill.

name: Skill Training
description: You become trained in one additional skill. You may take this feat multiple times.

name: Slippery Maneuver
description: You may reroll a check made to escape a grapple or avoid being pinned and take the better result.

name: Sniper
description: You may aim as a move action instead of a standard action when using a rifle or pistol.

name: Spring Attack
description: When making a melee attack, you may move both before and after the attack, up to your speed, without provoking attacks of opportunity from the target.

name: Staggering Attack
description: Once per encounter, you may move a target -1 step down the condition track when you hit with a melee attack.

name: Stealthy
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Stealth checks and may reroll a failed Stealth check once per encounter.

name: Stunning Strike
description: Once per encounter, you may move a target -1 step down the condition track when you hit with a melee attack.

name: Surgical Precision
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Treat Injury checks and may reroll a failed check once per encounter.

name: Tech Specialist
description: You may modify equipment, weapons, armor, or droids to grant a +2 equipment bonus to one skill or ability. Takes 1 hour and requires a workshop.

name: Toughness
description: You gain +5 hit points.

name: Triple Crit
prerequisite: Weapon Focus with selected weapon group, base attack bonus +12
description: When you score a critical hit with the selected weapon group, you deal triple damage instead of double.

name: Triple Crit Specialist
prerequisite: Triple Crit, Weapon Specialization with selected weapon group
description: When you score a critical hit with the selected weapon group, you deal triple damage and move the target -1 step down the condition track.

name: Trustworthy
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Persuasion checks and may reroll a failed Persuasion check once per encounter.

name: Two-Weapon Fighting
description: You reduce the penalty for fighting with two weapons by 2.

name: Unstoppable Force
description: You may spend a Force Point to ignore damage reduction or energy resistance when using a damaging Force power.

name: Vehicular Combat
description: Once per round, when your vehicle is hit in combat, you may make a Pilot check to negate the hit.

name: Weapon Finesse
description: You may use your Dexterity modifier instead of Strength for attack rolls with light melee weapons.

name: Weapon Focus
description: You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with the selected weapon group.

name: Weapon Proficiency (Heavy Weapons)
description: You are proficient with heavy weapons and do not take the -5 penalty when using them.

name: Weapon Proficiency (Pistols)
description: You are proficient with pistols and do not take the -5 penalty when using them.

name: Weapon Proficiency (Rifles)
description: You are proficient with rifles and do not take the -5 penalty when using them.

name: Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons)
description: You are proficient with simple weapons and do not take the -5 penalty when using them.

name: Weapon Specialization
prerequisite: Soldier level 4, Weapon Focus with selected weapon group
description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with the selected weapon group.

name: Whirlwind Attack
description: When making a melee attack, you may attack all adjacent enemies once each as a full-round action.

name: Wounding Strike
description: Once per encounter, you may move a target -1 step down the condition track when you hit with a melee attack.
